Package com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.manager

Class TaskManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
com.visionspace.taskmanager.impl.manager.TaskManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskManager
public class TaskManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskManager
Implementation of the TaskManager interface. This class essentially forwards task requests to a TaskStore, with tasks being launched in case there is a TaskLauncher listening to it.

  • Constructor Summary

    TaskManagerImpl​(TaskStore taskStore)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TaskHandle getTask​(java.lang.String taskId)
    Gets the TaskHandle for a given task, allowing to obtain its current state and to perform operations on it (e.g., cancel).
    java.util.stream.Stream<TaskHandle> getTasks()
    Gets all tasks that are present in the task store, included those that already finished.
    TaskHandle startAfter​(TaskDescriptor taskSpec, long delay, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
    Schedules a task for execution after a specified delay elapses.
    TaskHandle startAt​(TaskDescriptor taskSpec, long startTime)
    Schedules a task for execution at a specified time.
    TaskHandle startNow​(TaskDescriptor taskSpec)
    Schedules a task for immediate execution.

      public TaskHandle startNow​(TaskDescriptor taskSpec)
      Description copied from interface: TaskManager
      Schedules a task for immediate execution. It may happen the task execution is postponed in case there are no free worker threads.
      Specified by:

      Returns:

      Specified by:
